column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " Bato , it looks like home ! "
#Text=Sokka says : " Everything 's here , even the pelts ! "
#Text=Aang says : " Yeah , nothing 's cozier than dead animal skins . "
#Text=Katara says : " No way !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Dad could eat a whole barrel of these things !
#Text=" Katara says : " Bato , is it true that you and dad lassoed an arctic hippo ?
#Text=" Bato says : " It was your father 's idea , he just dragged me along .
#Text=Well , the hippo did the dragging !
#Text=" Aang says : " Hey , I ride animals , too !
#Text=There was this one time when I rode a giant eel and I - " Sokka says : " So , who was it that came up with the Great Blubber Fiasco ?
#Text=" Bato says : " You knew about that ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Everyone does !
#Text=" Aang says : " What 's that story ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " It 's a long one Aang , some other time .
#Text=" Katara says : " You and Dad had so many hilarious adventures .
#Text=" Bato says : " Not all of which were hilarious at the time , but everything 's funny in hindsight .
#Text=Hey , Aang !
#Text=Please put that down , it 's ceremonial and very fragile .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Was it you or Dad that put an octopus on your head and convinced Gran - Gran you were a water spirit ?
#Text=" Bato says : " Your dad wore the octopus , but I did the spooky voice .
#Text="
